page.title: 18THE SUPERNATURAL
page.content: Our area abounds in stories of ghosts and strange happenings. There seems to be widespread acceptance that ghosts have been seen on Friday's Hill which is on the A286 mainroad leading to Midhurst. This was the location of Friday's Hill House which was destroyed by fire in 1800 and again in 1925. Here the ghost of a maid with a tray of glasses with which she regaled travellers has been vouched for by several witnesses. Nearby there is an ancient cottage where the ghost of a murdered woman has been seen. She has been said to throw stones at travellers whom she did not like. Then there is the 'Lady in Grey' who has been seen sitting in the ruins of the burnt out house.
